import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { LoginContext } from '../LoginContext' import { useContext } from 'react' // import UserHeader from './UserHeader' function Header() { const { userLoginName, setuserLoginName, userLoginStatus, setuserLoginStatus } = useContext(LoginContext) const navigate = useNavigate() function handleLogout() { localStorage.removeItem('userLoginStatus') localStorage.removeItem('userLoginName') console.log('hello') navigate('/') } return (
